Sentencas: A simple configuration for an Fe-air rechargeable battery operating at high temperature was investigated.
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature

Sentencas: Two different ceramic electrolytes, that is, gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) and strontium/magnesium-doped lanthanum gallate (LSGM), were studied.
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature

Sentencas: Strontium-doped lanthanum ferrite-cobaltite (LSFCO) perovskite was used as the air electrode, whereas an Fe-0/Fe2O3-CGO composite was used as the Fe electrode.
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature

Sentencas: The synthesized CGO and LSGM supporting electrolytes were characterized by proper ionic conductivity for this application (7.4x10(-2) Scm(-1) at 800 degrees C).
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature

Sentencas: The LSFCO perovskite electrode showed excellent reversibility in symmetrical cells.
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature

Sentencas: Low overpotentials were recorded for the evolution of oxygen (0.1 V at 1.7 Acm(-2)) and the oxygen reduction process (0.1 V at 2.4 Acm(-2)) at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature

Sentencas: The high-temperature battery based on the CGO electrolyte showed a pronounced propensity to spontaneously discharge.
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature

Sentencas: This was caused by redox behavior involving the interconversion between the Ce4+ and Ce3+ ions in the crystallographic structure, which caused a parasitic electron drag through the electrolyte.
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature

Sentencas: On the other hand, the LSGM-based battery showed promising cyclability characteristics at 800 degrees C with an open-circuit voltage higher than 1V, an electric capacity of 0.3 Ahg(-1), and an energy density of 0.22 Whg(-1).
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature

Sentencas: However, significant improvements in the coulombic efficiency (approximate to 42%) for this battery system are necessary for practical applications.
Titulo: Iron-Air Battery Operating at High Temperature
